message.content:
cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.LG, cs.CYBER. 

The paper discusses recommendation algorithms and their application in e-commerce and entertainment industries, which falls under the information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category. The proposed graph-based representation of successive recommendations and the analysis of its topology can be considered as a form of social network analysis (cs.SOC) and machine learning (cs.LG). The focus on algorithmic transparency and bias detection can also be related to the sub-categories of social impact (cs.SI) and cybersecurity (cs.CYBER).
